StringTable.Label: CarbonBasedLife_Dec
StringTable.String: Carbon-based species use water and hydrocarbons as the basis of their chemistry. Their populations require food in order to grow.

StringTable.Label: AmphibiousAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Aquatic species live most of their lives deep in the oceans, giving them access to several unique Aquatic Techs. They can colonize Oceanic worlds with no penalty.

StringTable.Label: SiliconBasedAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Silicon lifeforms are built from rocks and rare minerals. They have no need for food, though their Growth is slow unless they have access to plentiful amounts of Promethion.

StringTable.Label: SyntheticLife_Dec
StringTable.String: Synthetics are robotic lifeforms that do not require food to survive, and can operate in a variety of environments. Unlike squishy organic species, Synthetics fabricate their population and can grow virtually unfettered.

StringTable.Label: AncientAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Gets Research from Precursor Artifacts and anomalies. Starts with an additional Policy slot.

StringTable.Label: CartographerAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts knowing the location of other homeworlds. They also receive 3 charges of the Dimensional Mirror power which reveals a portion of space and they gain an additional charge each time a Culture Trait is earned.

StringTable.Label: CertainAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes their philosophy should be universal, increased (+2) influence, special planet improvements. 30 [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] every time a Culture Trait is unlocked.

StringTable.Label: RavenousAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Receives 1,000 Credits and +10% Approval for 25 months after conquering a planet. It also grants the ability to consume aliens and spawn new Festron citizens.

StringTable.Label: CyberneticAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Gives Access to more powerful technologies and Improvements for races who are not afraid to interface with superior technologies.

StringTable.Label: DevoutAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with a Cleric citizen and a Krynniac Temple on their homeworld. Culture grows every time they add to their ideology.

StringTable.Label: ArchaeologistAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Whenever artifact charges are earned an additional charge is gained.

StringTable.Label: EngineersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Colony and asteroid production decays at half of the normal rate.

StringTable.Label: EntrepreneursAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with freighter, has a significant boost to Persuasion and receives 3 free trade licenses.

StringTable.Label: ExperiencedAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: All Ships receive 25% more Experience Points from battles.

StringTable.Label: StarfaringAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: +25% Ship Range. Starts with the ability to detect and travel on Subspace Streams.

StringTable.Label: HiveMindAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships in your territory gain additional Hit Points per colony controlled.

StringTable.Label: HopefulAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes any civilization capable of space travel must be a potential friend. Higher [HS=HS_Approval]Approval[/HS] on planets.

StringTable.Label: InspiredAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: An additional Leader is available for recruitment and Leaders cost 25% less to recruit.

StringTable.Label: LoyalAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Leaders all have +10 Loyalty and cost 25% less to recruit. +1 Cultural Point when a Leader is assigned to a Command Ship.

StringTable.Label: IntuitiveAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with access to Xeno Anthropology technologies and a free Culture trait.

StringTable.Label: ParanoidAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships receive +25% Hit Points and Attack when they are within their borders.

StringTable.Label: PatrioticAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with 50 [HS=HS_Control]Control[/HS] and access to coordination technologies.

StringTable.Label: FertileAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Start with 2 additional workers and population grows 25% faster.

StringTable.Label: ProliferationAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: When a ship is constructed, two ships are constructed instead. But all ships have -25% Hit Points.

StringTable.Label: PromethionBornAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships have double the normal [HS=HS_HitPoints]Hit Points[/HS] but don't heal normally.

StringTable.Label: CrimelordAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts allied with the Pirates. Also grants access to the 'Look the Other Way' Policy, improvements unlocked by increased [HS=HS_Crime]Crime[/HS] and Executive Orders to claim Pirate fleets and worlds.

StringTable.Label: SlaversAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Gain the ability to enslave your citizens, reducing their approval, production and food consumption. But they never protest. Gain access to Slaving Technologies.

StringTable.Label: SporesAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with the ability to deploy spores to a dead world to restore life. Each time a new Culture Trait is gained another charge is earned.

StringTable.Label: ResilientAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ships immune to nebula and have access to special Hyperion improvements.

StringTable.Label: UnrelentingAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: +10 Control. Planets generate +1 more Influence per month.

StringTable.Label: UnwaveringAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Colonies are much harder to Culture flip, and access to the Unbroken Spirit technologies.

StringTable.Label: VigilantAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starbases have larger Areas of Effect. Enemy ships are slowed, and player ships gain an attack bonus, while in the area of any starbase. Makes available techs that increase movement speed.

StringTable.Label: WarProfiteersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Receives 200% bonus from trade routes established with warring races.

StringTable.Label: WarriorsAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ignore 10% of all damage done to their ships. All weapons do 10% more damage.

StringTable.Label: WealthyAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Starts with 2000 more credits and the Universal Translator technology.

StringTable.Label: ColonyStartingFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with two Colony Ships to quickly find and colonize new worlds.

StringTable.Label: ScoutingFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with a colony ship and three probes.

StringTable.Label: ColonyStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with a Colony Ship and probe to quickly find and colonize new worlds.

StringTable.Label: ConstructorsStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Start with two Constructors that start to quickly tap the galactic resources.

StringTable.Label: ScoutsStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Start with three tiny Probes that quickly explore the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: SurveyStartingShip_Dec
StringTable.String: Begin with a Flag Ship that explores the galaxy and investigates valuable Anomalies.

StringTable.Label: DisableRepairAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: This civilization does not repair normally.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Totalitarianism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in absolute power and control by the state, with all aspects of public and private life under the governance of a single authority.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Pacifism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in opposing war and violence, advocating for the resolution of conflicts through peaceful negotiations and mutual respect.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Collectivism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in prioritizing the group, community, or society over individual interests, often with a focus on shared responsibility and collective action.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Progressivism_Dec
StringTable.String: Advocates for social reform and new ideas. Progressives are often open to change and seek to address social inequalities and injustices through innovation and reform.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Individualism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the primacy of individual rights, personal freedom, and self-reliance, often over the needs and interests of the community or society.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Nihilism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the rejection or denial of inherent meaning or value in life. Causing pain to others is a valid purpose.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Traditionalism_Dec
StringTable.String: This philosophy values historical continuity and emphasizes the importance of customs, practices, and institutions that have endured over time. Traditionalists often resist rapid social change and maintain a deep reverence for cultural heritage.

StringTable.Label: StartingIdeology_Egalitarianism_Dec
StringTable.String: Believes in the fundamental equality of all sentient beings, advocating for equal rights and opportunities regardless of species, origin planet, or other characteristics.

StringTable.Label: TelepathyAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Can use telepathic executive orders to place thoughts in the minds of all citizens on a planet, for good or evil.

StringTable.Label: AmmoniaBasedAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Ammonia lifeforms thrive on volatile gases and complex nitrogen compounds. While they do consume food, their growth rate significantly accelerates in environments rich in pollutants.

StringTable.Label: WatcherAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Grants the Cosmic Eye Executive Order. The Cosmic Eye can reveal a part of the galaxy and grants additional research or a new technology when used on another player's planet.[BR][BR]+5 [HS=HS_SensorRange]Sensor Range[/HS] for Planets.[BR]+1 [HS=HS_SensorRange]Sensor Range[/HS] for Ships and Starbases.

StringTable.Label: RadiatedAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Can colonize Radioactive Worlds. Gains the [HS=HS_ArtifactPollutionBomb]Abhorent Infection[/HS] Executive Order after several months.[BR][BR][HS=HS_ArtifactPollutionBomb]Abhorent Infection[/HS] raises the [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS] level on a target planet.

StringTable.Label: NocturnalAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: Developed to work in cycles, each lasting 15 months.[BR][BR]Season of Waking: [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] are boosted.[BR]Season of Dreaming: [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] are boosted.

StringTable.Label: NocturnalAbility_SeasonOfWakingDescription
StringTable.String: Developed to work in cycles, each lasting 15 months.[BR][BR]Season of Waking: [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] are boosted. [BR][BR]{AMOUNT} months remaining.

StringTable.Label: NocturnalAbility_SeasonOfDreamingDescription
StringTable.String: Developed to work in cycles, each lasting 15 months.[BR][BR]Season of Dreaming: [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] are boosted. [BR][BR]{AMOUNT} months remaining.
